entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
